tool_description: Gathers and structures procurement requirements from multiple stakeholder inputs into standardized categories for RFP development.

project_title.description: Official name of the procurement project

functional_requirements.description: List of functional requirements for the procurement

error_messages: Missing project information: Provide both project_title and requesting department.
Empty requirements list: At least one functional requirement must be specified.
Invalid requirement format: Requirements must be clear, measurable statements.
usage: Input the project title, department, and lists of functional requirements. Optionally include technical specifications and performance standards. The tool structures these into a standardized requirements document.

requirements_id.description: Unique identifier for the requirements document
